_header: Two monks were woning in a cell
_description: The Monk who was harsh in judging, a Narratio in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodSelSup52.First Lines:
Two monkes wonyd in a cell& of þem als Aunter
                    fell…
BodSelSup52.Last Lines:
…Our lord Ihesu crist vs spedTo do penance & þer vs
                    lede

BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
TWo monkes woned in a CelleAnd on of hem as aunter
                    felle…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Vre lord Ihesu crist vs spedeTo do penaunce and þider vs
                    lede. Amen
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Hou on demed on oþur for brekynge off hys fast (f.
                    200rc)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.
BodEngPoeta1.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Die Evangelien-Geschichten der Homiliensammlung des Ms. Vernon.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         57 (1877): 241-316: 288.

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
TWo Monkes woned in a CelleAnd on of hem as aunter
                    felle…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…Vre lord Ihesus crist vs spedeTo do penaunce & þider

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Twa monkes were wonnande in a cellAnd ane of þan als awnter
                    fell…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde brynge vs to þat blysseEuer þare to
                    duelle with hym and hisse

BLHar2391.First Lines: To monkes war wonand in a celleAnd one of þam as aunter felle…
BLHar2391.Last Lines: …Owr lord bryng vs to þat blyseEuer þar to duell with hym & hys
BLHar2391.Attributed Title: Dominica iiii (left margin, f. 197) with “A tale” written above

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Twa monkys wonnes in a celland ane of þam aunter
                    fell…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…oure lorde ihc ihesu criste vs spedeto do penaunce
                    & þider vs lede

HunHM129.First Lines:
Two monkys wonnyd in a cellAnd one off ham as a tyme
                    fell…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Oure loueryd ihesu crist vs spedeTo do penauns and
                    þiddyr vs lede
